name: markdown-magic-transform-treefile-extended
description: A markdown-magic transform to generate a dynamic file tree in your markdown files. This extended version provides additional options for customizing the output.

scripts.fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run format:package
scripts.prep: npm run docs && npm run fix

docs.description: Generate documentation by processing README.md with markdown-magic.

fix.description: Automatically fix linting issues and format codebase.

format.description: Format all project files using Prettier.

format:package.description: Format the package.json file using Prettier.

lint.description: Lint all project files to ensure code quality and consistency.

lint:fix.description: Lint all project files and automatically fix issues where possible.

prep.description: Prepare the project for publishing by generating docs and formatting code.

test.description: Run the test suite using Jest.

author: Ion Gireada
